DEMO_801_MSG_010:
̃Hey hey, what's with that look! You look like you've just seen a ghost... rest assured, I am alive and well!
ā
DEMO_801_MSG_020:
̃However, I am not the same Lucia you met before.
ā
DEMO_801_MSG_100:
̃Before we'll be able to rescue her, let's see if we can't
do something to fix me up a bit first.
DEMO_801_MSG_030:
̃It's a bit complicated, but I am just like you... created
from the same type of cloning technology.
DEMO_801_MSG_110:
̃ȁ, is there any way you could take me with you to Ground Zero? It's just beyond the Core...
ā
DEMO_801_MSG_040:
̃The technology used on me, however, is a bit older, so it took me a little bit more time to be fully prepared.
ā
DEMO_801_MSG_120:
̃In order to reach Ground Zero, you'll need to Sky Ride
with me from the Core... and head due north.
DEMO_801_MSG_050:
̃That's why I'm just showing up all of a sudden...
I'm sorry I wasn't there to help you against Carmasso.
ā
DEMO_801_MSG_060:
̃And Renerte now has a soul... she started to have feelings when she was detached from Mother.
ā
And I feel sorry for leaving her at the Core, especially because she has feeling now.
DEMO_801_MSG_070:
̃However, ȁ... that's hopefully not the
last that we'll see of her!
ā
DEMO_801_MSG_080:
̃In fact, if we work together on this idea of mine, I'm
certain that we'd be able to rescure her!
DEMO_801_MSG_090:
̃Ugh, this dang clone... I really need one made with the same tech that we used to make you.
ā
